name: Adventure (itch) (BoggoFroggo)
description:
Travel throughout a labyrinth with three levels

Fight monsters of every shape and size 

Collect 10 unique treasures

Escape the gaze of Necro, the all seeing eye.

Battle against The Big Three Bosses, Murphy, Minotaur, and The Red Knight

Tell me if you find any glitches or bugs that shouldn't be there

Tell me if the game is too confusing or hard (I want to help)

Tell me if the game is too easy or not fun

Look for things such as:

An iron sword, some bubbly medicine, a wedding ring, a well lit candle, a dirty shovel, a dusty book, a lizard's egg, a wizard's wand, a golden coin, a cloak of invisibility, and a secret mystery item.
